sections.name: Couplet!homme
lyrics: Are you happy in this modern world?
Is there somethin' else you're searchin' for?
In all the good times I find myself
And in the bad times I fear myself

sections.name: Couplet!femme
lyrics: Aren't you tired tryin' to fill that void?
Ain't it hard keeping it so hardcore?
In all the good times I find myself
And in the bad times I fear myself

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: I'm off the deep end, watch as I dive in
Crash through the surface, where they can't hurt us
We're far from the shallow now
We're far from the shallow now

lyrics: Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
